Subject: Amp (to be replaced?)

::Amp::
    He was wondering around in the woods when he came to a clearing.  At the 
side of the clearing was an opened stasis pod.  He looked around fascinated, 
and looking to fight.  He spotted a large saber tooth tiger in a tree just 
before it crushed him.

::????????::
    He crushed the pathetic bot and transformed slashing and hacking at Amp's 
chest with his twin daggers.  Before killing him he asked "What is your name?"

::Amp::
    "I am Amp.  But who are you?"

::????????::
    "I am the bot who has no name.  I was the slave of a great bot.  
Unfortunately for him he had me trained too well.  As soon as I became a 
weapons master I killed him.  His body was never found rather it was never 
identified.  You should be honored I shall derive my name from yours."  He 
finishes Amp off by impaling his head with both daggers.  "I am Amperion now!"

::Amperion::
    "He heads deep into the woods in order to find one worthy of training 
under him.
